requirements: Construction may proceed to the next inspection milestone.
The inspection request was cancelled by the permit holder prior to the inspection.
Construction shall not proceed past the current inspection milestone until the noted corrections have been corrected and approved as described in teh inspection notes.
The inspector arrived to a location that was not ready for inspection. A reinspection fee must be paid prior to the next inspection request.
The current inspection milestone is large and has been broken up into several inspections. The portion of the work that has been approved is described in the inspection notes.
Construction may proceed to the next inspection milestone. At that milestone noted items from this inspection will need to be inspected as described in teh inspection notes.
